page.title: 17SHOPPING
page.content: GALASHIELS IS VERY WELL SERVED AND HAS EVERYTHING FROM THE LARGE SUPERMARKET TO THE SMALL CORNER SHOP WHICH SELLS ITS WIDE VARIETY OF GOODS SEVEN DAYS OF THE WEEK FROM CRACK OF DAWN UNTIL LATE AT NIGHT. IN THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA IN CHANNEL STREET THE NATIONAL NAMES MAY BE SEEN e.g.WOOLWORTH,BOOTS,JOHN MENZIES. THE FOOD SUPERMARKETS ALL OPERATE ON THE SELF SERVICE SYSTEM WHICH INVOLVES THE SHOPPER SELECTING THE GOODS OF THEIR CHOICE,PUTTING THEM IN A WIRE BASKET OR TROLLEY,TAKING THEM TO A CHECKOUT POINT WHERE AN ASSISTANT CALCULATES THE TOTAL SPENT ON AN ELECTRONIC MACHINE.MEAT AND DELICATESSAN ITEMS ARE PURCHASED AT A COUNTER WHERE ONE CAN CHOOSE THE QUANTITY REQUIRED.
